=== Launchpad Bazaar Branches ===

==== Code contributions ====

===== Oneiric Cycle =====

* Unity indicators redesign: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~3v1n0/unity/indicators-redesign|unity, UnityCore and unity-panel-service]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~3v1n0/unity-2d/unity-core-indicators-revisited|unity-2d]]</nowiki>
* Correctly raises minimized windows: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/unity/fix-688117|lp:~3v1n0/unity/fix-688117]]</nowiki>
* Workspace icon launcher managment: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/unity/fix-690143|lp:~3v1n0/unity/fix-690143]]</nowiki>
* Don't unminimize windows if not needed: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/unity/fix-783434|lp:~3v1n0/unity/fix-783434]]</nowiki>
* Better launcher edge revelation: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/unity/laucher-edge-reveal-revisited|lp:~3v1n0/unity/laucher-edge-reveal-revisited]]</nowiki>
* Nux support for layout child position: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/nux/layout-child-position-set|lp:~3v1n0/nux/layout-child-position-set]]</nowiki>
* Secondary Activate support for Indicators: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/libindicator/secondary-activate-support|libindicator]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/indicator-application/secondary-activate-support|indicator-application]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/libappindicator/secondary-activate-support|libappindicator]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/unity/secondary-activate-support|unity]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/unity-2d/secondary-activate-support|unity-2d natty]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~3v1n0/unity-2d/secondary-activate-support-v2|unity-2d oneiric]]</nowiki>.
* Get back scrolling on unity indicators: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/unity/indicator-scroll-nux-sync|lp:~3v1n0/unity/indicator-scroll-nux-sync]]</nowiki>
* Indicator-messages, clear notifications on secondary activate: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/indicator-messages/clear-notifications|lp:~3v1n0/indicator-messages/clear-notifications]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/indicator-messages/clear-notifications-on-secondary-activate|lp:~3v1n0/indicator-messages/clear-notifications-on-secondary-activate]]</nowiki>
* Indicator-sound, mute on middle-click: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/indicator-sound/mute-on-secondary-activate|lp:~3v1n0/indicator-sound/mute-on-secondary-activate]]</nowiki>
* Add gobject-introspection valid syntax docs to libappindicator: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/libappindicator/g-ir-scanner-docs|lp:~3v1n0/libappindicator/g-ir-scanner-docs]]</nowiki>
* Get back the fade effect for long titles on unity: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/unity/fading-title-fix|lp:~3v1n0/unity/fading-title-fix]]</nowiki>
* Correctly parse the opengl version in Unity: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/unity/opengl-version-check|lp:~3v1n0/unity/opengl-version-check]]</nowiki>
* Port libgwibber to GDBus: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/gwibber/gwibber-with-libgwibber-ported-to-gdbus|lp:~3v1n0/gwibber/gwibber-with-libgwibber-ported-to-gdbus]]</nowiki>.
* Huge bunch of fixes to the BAMF .desktop file matcher: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/bamf/fixes|lp:~3v1n0/bamf/fixes]]</nowiki>

===== Natty Cycle =====

* Use WM_CLASS to match windows in BAMF: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/bamf/wmclass-matching|lp:~3v1n0/bamf/wmclass-matching]]</nowiki>
* Fade the unity window title if it's too long: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/unity/fading-title|lp:~3v1n0/unity/fading-title]]</nowiki>
* Add support to Intellihide to the unity launcher: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/unity/autohide-intellihide|lp:~3v1n0/unity/autohide-intellihide]]</nowiki>
* VAPI (Vala bindings) fixes to libappindicator <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/libappindicator/vala-bindings-fixes|lp:~3v1n0/libappindicator/vala-bindings-fixes]]</nowiki>
* Add notify-osd support to indicator-sound (on scroll volume change) <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/indicator-sound/notify-osd-on-scroll|lp:~3v1n0/indicator-sound/notify-osd-on-scroll]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/indicator-sound/fix-729849|lp:~3v1n0/indicator-sound/fix-729849]]</nowiki>
* Scroll-event support to Indicators: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/libindicator/scroll-event-support|libindicator]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/indicator-application/scroll-event-support|indicator-application]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/libappindicator/scroll-event-support|libappindicator]]</nowiki>, [[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/unity/scroll-event-support|unity], <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/unity-2d/scroll-event-support|unity-2d]]</nowiki>
* Add support to pango markup to the indicator-datetime label: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/indicator-datetime/clock-label-improvements|lp:~3v1n0/indicator-datetime/clock-label-improvements]]</nowiki>
* gwibber-service, don't break on failing messages: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/%7E3v1n0/gwibber/failing-messages-loading-fix|lp:~3v1n0/gwibber/failing-messages-loading-fix]]</nowiki>
